totp.name: Timed password
totp.howTo: Push 'Generate QrCode ', then scan the code using your Google Authenticator app (iOS and Android) or + Authenticator (Windows Phone) or enter the code directly into the application

random_code.name: One time password
random_code.description: Method to generate random codes valid for some time

bypass.name: Backup codes
bypass.description: Method for generating a random codes list

matrix.name: Authentication Grid
matrix.description: Method to connect via a grid

push.name: Notification
push.description: Method for connecting via smartphone notifications
push.push_confirmation1: Please scan this code in the smartphone application
push.push_confirmation2: If your smartphone does not have a functional picture appreil or you are having difficulties to scan the code above. Go to the menu "Settings " then click "Activate without scan ".

app.home: ESUP-OTP permits you to add a second level of protection to your account. You can, for example, set a single-use code sent to you by SMS in addition to your username and password. Thus, a third can not access your account with the same password.

api.home: ESUP-OTP permez you to add a second level of protection to your account. You can, for example, set a single-use code sent to you by SMS in addition to your username and password. Thus, a third can not access your account with the same password.
api.title: ESUP OTP Manager
